name: You're The BOMB
description:
A clicker game where you're the bomb, for Android.

Your phone needs to be compatible with ARCore Face recognition.

It is a quite simple game: you're the bomb, and in 30 seconds you're gonna explode

Lucky you, water balls will give you some extra time.

Unlucky you, magma balls will remove some of your time.

How much time will you survive?
